DisplayForm.Script: <UiScreen> <Title>Select function</Title> <LinkScreen> <LinkControl> <LinkItem href="./orderscan"> <Label imgsrc="./img/scan.jpg">Order Scan</Label> </LinkItem> <LinkItem href="./scan2cifs"> <Label imgsrc="./img/networksrv.jpg">Scan 2 CIFS</Label> </LinkItem> <LinkItem href="./scan2mail"> <Label imgsrc="./img/email.jpg">Scan 2 mail</Label> </LinkItem> <LinkItem href="./scan2ocr"> <Label imgsrc="./img/ocr.jpg">Scan 2 OCR PDF</Label> </LinkItem> <LinkItem href="./scan_qrcodes"> <Label imgsrc="./img/qrcode.jpg">Scan barcode</Label> </LinkItem> <LinkItem href="./read_rfid"> <Label imgsrc="./img/badge.jpg">Read RFID</Label> </LinkItem> <LinkItem href="./selector"> <Label imgsrc="./img/brother.jpg">Multiple emails</Label> </LinkItem> </LinkControl> </LinkScreen> </UiScreen>
